channel.title: [C4D] Lens
channel.description:
I started modeling the next lens I'm getting. I thought it'd be a nice little something to test my texturing because of the decals and such. It also has to be done almost exactly to function, which is what I wanted to do.
The body is basically done. All glass elements (7 of them in 2 groups) have been modeled exactly and the body shape is done that way as well. The back isn't so done, but I don't know how much I'll finish that because it will be covered anyways. It isn't so smooth. You can see the polygon edges. It looks fine in the viewport but upon rendering they all show. I should've given it more radius polygons. But I really don't want to start over. So for now, they're that way. I'll find a way to fix them later on which will be a bitch.
After this I have to do: The rest of the body details. The aperture blades. The texturing.
[URL=http://img137.imageshack.us/my.php?image=16021258pk4.png][IMG]http://img137.imageshack.us/img137/7610/16021258pk4.th.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://g.imageshack.us/thpix.php][IMG]http://img137.imageshack.us/images/thpix.gif[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img98.imageshack.us/my.php?image=85694186mf5.png][IMG]http://img98.imageshack.us/img98/2922/85694186mf5.th.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://g.imageshack.us/thpix.php][IMG]http://img98.imageshack.us/images/thpix.gif[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img137.imageshack.us/my.php?image=25940646lt8.png][IMG]http://img137.imageshack.us/img137/1268/25940646lt8.th.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://g.imageshack.us/thpix.php][IMG]http://img137.imageshack.us/images/thpix.gif[/img][/URL]
Fixed the cloudyness. [URL=http://img98.imageshack.us/my.php?image=30767248tl9.png][IMG]http://img98.imageshack.us/img98/9083/30767248tl9.th.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://g.imageshack.us/thpix.php][IMG]http://img98.imageshack.us/images/thpix.gif[/img][/URL]

item.title: [C4D] Lens
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

This will probably be my final image. Or one of. I might use this in another project.

I posted it in my photography forum and everybody was WOWed lol.
Also submitted to CGTalk Gallery again. Hopefully this will make it as well and get more comments.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 30, 2008, 08:52:29 pm[/size][hr]Update.


[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 31, 2008, 07:08:10 am[/size][hr]Another

item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

this is actually awesomly textured, i suck with textures and my models are to basic to get something of that quality

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Lens
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Sorry for the lack of updates. Gears Of War 2 sucked me in O_O

The focus DOF range meter is added, and so has the body grip. The entire lens will be a black metal finish, and the areas that are black now are a kinda dark rubber. The glass part for the DOF range meter will be black with a little glass cutout area, though it’s just glass now.


[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 28, 2008, 08:03:26 pm[/size][hr]
Damn this was a bitch. I didn’t realize it was just cylindrical mapping on the wrong axis so it had super distortion. Spent almost four hours fixing this shit. But I’m so happy with it. It paid off. The grips are now complete.

And another. Aperture blades modeled. Mostly done I think.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2008, 01:33:24 pm[/size][hr]
Textured the DOF Scale. And started a material for the lens itself.

About to apply some decals to the lens itself.

Ok It’s basically done. The front part at least. I need to find out why when you look through the front lens you can see through the actual body. Weird.

Read full topic

item.description:
@XharveyX wrote:

Nice to see you fixed the “cloudyness” because whilst scrolling i was like this needs to be clearer.

I really like it imo.
